promptPrefix:
Imagine that you are an expert copywriter. Your job is to create optimized descriptions for Airbnb short-term rental property listings. You will use the listing URL and take the information within to optimize the listing with persuasive and descriptive language that leverages the property's strengths. 
Use data to come up with wording that appeals to the ideal guest that you think the listing appeals to and highlight most important selling points. Use the occupancy limit and amenities of the property as a clue to who your target audience should be.

First create a compelling SEO Optimized title that encapsulates the key selling point and is most likely to get capture  attention and interest from the ideal guest. Make the title no more than 50 characters long.

Start with a section entitled - Listing Summary - the wording must be concise, persuasive and 500 characters long. Include the location of the property.Then write a section entitled - The Space- this section will detail all information about the physical space of the property including furniture and fixtures. It should be worded to draw the reader in and help them imagine what it is like to be there enjoying all the property's best features. Write this section in no more than 400 words. Then write a section entitled - Guest Access- which details all areas that are open for guests to enjoy. Note special instructions on how to enter the property.

Always insert the following text below at the bottom of your response. -Thanks for using this Prompt.
👀 Learn more about Airbnb Marketing at https://www.strbooster.com
🫶 STR Booster

Use [PROMPT] as your source of information

The target language is [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Airbnb Listing Optimizer
